formattedAddress: 101 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 101 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
Yuri and Angela are both wonderful and have been with me since day one of my puppy's training journey.

Yuri and Angela tailor plans to my pup's unique needs, turning frustrating behaviors into joyful moments. I worked with Yuri for several months to get my pup through separation anxiety and getting comfortable being alone. I could not have done it without her!

Angela is thorough, encouraging, and simply wonderful with my pup. I am always pleasantly surprised at how quickly I see progress after a session with Angela.

I am very impressed with the professionalism and patient support throughout my pup's journey. Absolutely recommend!

originalText.text: Stephanie is the best: she knows both extensive techniques and idiosyncratic elements specific to each dog and parent. Kimono, and his family (Jesse and Karolina), are always better for the training sessions.

text.text: Stephanie is the best: she knows both extensive techniques and idiosyncratic elements specific to each dog and parent. Kimono, and his family (Jesse and Karolina), are always better for the training sessions.

originalText.text:
Yuri is absolutely amazing! We brought her in to help with our 1.5 year old mini Australian shepherd - after the first session she had taught him vital skills to help cope with his anxiousness around the doorbell by going to a particular spot and waiting calmly. We were so impressed with how quickly she was able to connect with our dog and really get him to listen. This was our first experience with an in home trainer and Yuri made it an amazing experience.

Yuri made us feel comfortable and addressed all of our questions as she trained. She easily taught us how to implement the tricks like leave it, drop it and settle into our daily routine to help manage our dog's energy levels. After every session we felt confident that we could continue the training and practice from Yuri's amazing instructions, and the additional homework sheets she emailed us were so helpful!

We cannot recommend Yuri enough! You can tell within minutes that she truly is passionate about dogs and loves what she does. She was so sweet and patient, she really made us feel so comfortable! We plan on buying another package as soon as possible! If you're even considering booking Yuri - do it!

originalText.text: The trainers were very knowledgeable and informative. They made sure I was educated enough to continue training once my dogs were home. I’ve seen such a huge difference in my dogs. i loved the experience of Yuruani Olguin Dog Training.

text.text: The trainers were very knowledgeable and informative. They made sure I was educated enough to continue training once my dogs were home. I’ve seen such a huge difference in my dogs. i loved the experience of Yuruani Olguin Dog Training.

originalText.text:
We are first time dog owners and have a large, energetic puppy.  We did our best through self training but needed some extra help.  Yuruani Olguin Dog Training was incredibly helpful and exactly what we needed.

Communication was quick and the team was accommodating with any scheduling changes that were needed, (with proper notice).  We hosted the trainings in our apartment and within one session we made major strides.  We learned that the majority of the training was actually for ourselves and in turn, that made training our puppy that much more effective.

We learned new commands and new ways to approach training and walking with our puppy.  He is a much better walker today and we couldn't be happier with Yuruani's services.  Highly recommended.
